channel.title: Cost of a development team?
channel.description:
Sorry if this isn't the right place to ask but I have been searching a bit and can't seem to find an answer to my question.
I'm looking to fund a game development not a runescape copyright or any other copyright I'm just looking to completely have a new game developed. I'm trying to get rough estimates on how much this could cost me. And if anyone knows were or how I would find a development team for this?
I have ran my very own rsps a few years ago and I enjoyed it a ton. Which is how I got the idea to save to have my own game developed.

I’m looking to fund a game development not a runescape copyright or any other copyright I’m just looking to completely have a new game developed. I’m trying to get rough estimates on how much this could cost me. And if anyone knows were or how I would find a development team for this?

I have ran my very own rsps a few years ago and I enjoyed it a ton. Which is how I got the idea to save to have my own game developed.[/quote]

Join me https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662506.0.html

Will be creating a completely new client new char models graphics and world

Read full topic

item.title: Cost of a development team?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Your naivety isn’t surprising. Of course, your attitude leading to a failed project wouldn’t be surprising either. If I had a dollar for everybody who thought a polished product (as opposed to a polished turd) could be delivered on the cheap, well, let’s just say I’d be set for several lifetimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Cost of a development team?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“freddie griner, post:7, topic:543283”]Lmfao well who needs an office so - rent oh and most people have there own computers I own about 6 myself so - computers and - furnished office lmao. Oh and I don’t need 20 year masters more like people who learned by teaching them selfs and this wouldn’t be like a full time job more like on the side. And im not talking 10-20k a year I’m talking 10-20k to get it started.[/quote]Cool, then you need to find friends and people with common interests to work on this project with you. You need to provide something that inspires them to work for significantly less than they could get elsewhere, and you need to accept that they’d want to take ownership of the project as well as yourself. Based on your posts so far you don’t seem like that kind of person. These “self taught” programmers willing to work for less than a liveable wage simply do not exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Cost of a development team?
item.dc:creator: @freddie_griner freddie griner
item.description:
@freddie_griner wrote:

Lmfao well who needs an office so - rent oh and most people have there own computers I own about 6 myself so - computers and - furnished office lmao. Oh and I don’t need 20 year masters more like people who learned by teaching them selfs and this wouldn’t be like a full time job more like on the side. And im not talking 10-20k a year I’m talking 10-20k to get it started.

Read full topic

item.title: Cost of a development team?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

An entry-level developer’s market salary in Australia is typically $50k or higher. And as entry-level developers, they aren’t going to be super productive. Most people earning that kind of salary are fresh-faced and straight out of university.

A senior developer is probably $80k per year, if not higher. A graphic designer, probably $45k - $55k per year.

What do you think you’ll get for $10k? That’s not even enough to furnish a small office environment for five workers (assuming $1500 per computer, and then other things like desks), let alone rent and salaries.

Read full topic

item.title: Cost of a development team?
item.dc:creator: @freddie_griner freddie griner
item.description:
@freddie_griner wrote:

Sorry if I’m coming off dumb but I’m new to this why do I need an android application I was just hoping to find a few people who know how to code and graphic designs ect. Or if I was lucky I could find like 2-4 people who can put my ideas together. Idk I was hoping for 10k-20k to just get the game started then obviously update and make the game better as the game grosses money.

Read full topic

item.title: Cost of a development team?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:3, topic:543283”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=662158.msg4425770#msg4425770 date=1400756499]
A polished android application can cost anywhere from $200k and up. Developing a non-trivial game would run into the millions.
[/quote]

Damn , that’s alot of money for such thing… Don’t you think?[/quote]

Not really. You would have more then 1 developer and you’ll also need to find people for graphics, music etc too. If anything 200k is budgeting.

Read full topic
